triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper applies machine learning techniques to predict tweet retweeting behavior.

triples.name: Online machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using the passive-aggressive algorithm, an online machine learning approach for real-time prediction.

triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: Twitter is the social network platform on which the study focuses on predicting message propagation.

triples.name: Tweet (social media)
triples.relevance: Tweets are the core content objects whose propagation patterns the paper analyzes.

triples.name: Network science
triples.relevance: The paper studies message propagation through social networks, a key topic in network science.
